Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.AlternatorTool
    use CSS3 nth-child(even/odd) selectors or #if($foreach.index % 2)
    org.apache.velocity.tools.view.BrowserToolDeprecatedMethods
    org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.ConversionTool
    use NumberTool for numbers formatting/parsing, DateTool for date/time formatting/parsing, or CollectionTool for toStrings().
    org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.SortTool
    use CollectionTool sort methods
